data.name: AddModuleCmd_Err
data.value: 新模块添加失败，请重试！

data.name: AddModuleCmd_Sql
data.value: insert into s_module (p_id,modulename,href,sort,icon,addtime,ad_s_user_id,isenable,invalid) values (@p_id, @modulename, @href, @sort, @icon, @addtime, @ad_s_user_id, @isenable, @invalid); select a.*,b.codename isenable_text,c.username ad_s_user_name from s_module a,p_code b,s_user c where a.isenable=b.code and b.tab_p_codetype_id='ISENABLE' and a.ad_s_user_id=c.id and a.id=SCOPE_IDENTITY();

data.name: DeleteModuleCmd_Err
data.value: 模块删除失败，请重试！

data.name: DeleteModuleCmd_Sql
data.value: delete from s_module where id in (0@ids);

data.name: ListCodesCmd_Err
data.value: 代码列表查询失败，请重试！

data.name: ListCodesCmd_Sql
data.value: select a.code+','+a.tab_p_codetype_id id,a.*,b.codename isenable_text,c.username ad_s_user_name from p_code a, p_code b,s_user c where a.isenable=b.code and b.tab_p_codetype_id='ISENABLE' and a.ad_s_user_id=c.id and a.tab_p_codetype_id=@tab_p_codetype_id order by a.sort asc

data.name: ListCodeTypesCmd_Err
data.value: 代码类型列表查询失败，请重试！

data.name: ListCodeTypesCmd_Sql
data.value: select a.*,b.codename isenable_text,c.username ad_s_user_name from p_codetype a,p_code b,s_user c where a.isenable=b.code and b.tab_p_codetype_id='ISENABLE' and a.ad_s_user_id=c.id order by a.id asc

data.name: ListModulesCmd_Err
data.value: 模块列表查询失败，请重试！

data.name: ListModulesCmd_Sql
data.value: select a.id, a.modulename, a.href,a.moduledesc, a.icon, a.sort, a.addtime,c.username ad_s_user_name, b.codename isenable_text,a.p_id from s_module a,p_code b,s_user c where a.modtype=1 and a.isenable=b.code and b.tab_p_codetype_id='ISENABLE' and a.ad_s_user_id=c.id @appendSQL order by a.p_id,a.sort,a.id asc

data.name: ListUserMenuTreeCmd_Err
data.value: 用户菜单树列表查询失败，请重试！

data.name: ListUserMenuTreeCmd_Sql
data.value: exec p_userMenuTree 1,1,@userid
data.comment: 获取用户菜单树列表，根据权限得到

data.name: ListUsersCmd_Err
data.value: 用户列表查询失败，请重试！

data.name: ListUsersCmd_Sql
data.value:
select a.id,a.username,a.sex,a.alias,a.firstname,a.lastname, a.firstname+a.lastname as realname,a.qq,a.email,a.idcard,a.mobile,a.fax,a.last_logoutime, a.addtime,a.opt_s_user_id,a.isenable,a.invalid,b.codename isenable_text from ( select tt.* from ( select row_number() over(order by t.addtime desc) as rowNumber,t.* from s_user t where 1=1 @appendSQL ) tt
where tt.rowNumber between (@currentpage-1)*@pagesize+1 and @currentpage*@pagesize
) a
, p_code b where a.isenable=b.code and b.tab_p_codetype_id='ISENABLE'

data.name: LoginCmd_Err
data.value: 用户名或密码输入错误，请重试！

data.name: LoginCmd_Sql
data.value: select id, username, sex, firstname, lastname, firstname+lastname as realname, qq, email, idcard, mobile, fax, apikey, secretkey, addtime, ad_s_user_id, isenable, invalid from s_user where isenable=1 and username=@username and password=@password

data.name: LogoutCmd_Sql
data.value: update s_user set logoutime=@logoutime where id=@id

data.name: ResetUserPasswordCmd_Err
data.value: 很抱歉，用户新密码重置失败，请重试！

data.name: ResetUserPasswordCmd_Sql
data.value: update s_user set password=@password where id=@id

data.name: ResetUserPasswordCmd_Tip
data.value: 恭喜您，用户新密码重置成功！

data.name: UpdateModuleCmd_Err
data.value: 模块信息更新失败，请重试！

data.name: UpdateModuleCmd_Sql
data.value: update s_module set modulename=@modulename, href=@href, icon=@icon, sort=@sort, editime=@editime, ed_s_user_id=@ed_s_user_id where id=@id; select a.*,b.codename isenable_text,c.username ad_s_user_name from s_module a,p_code b,s_user c where a.isenable=b.code and b.tab_p_codetype_id='ISENABLE' and a.ad_s_user_id=c.id and a.id=@id;

data.name: VerifyUserKeysCmd_Err
data.value: 用户密钥验证失败，请重试！

data.name: VerifyUserKeysCmd_Sql
data.value: select * from s_user where apikey=@apikey

data.name: AddCodeTypeCmd_Err
data.value: 新代码类型添加失败，请重试！

data.name: AddCodeTypeCmd_Sql
data.value: insert into p_codetype (id,codetypedesc,addtime,ad_s_user_id,isenable,invalid) values (@id, @codetypedesc, @addtime, @ad_s_user_id, @isenable, @invalid); select a.*,b.codename isenable_text,c.username ad_s_user_name from p_codetype a,p_code b,s_user c where a.isenable=b.code and b.tab_p_codetype_id='ISENABLE' and a.ad_s_user_id=c.id and a.id=@id;

data.name: UpdateCodeTypeCmd_Err
data.value: 代码类型信息更新失败，请重试！

data.name: UpdateCodeTypeCmd_Sql
data.value: update p_codetype set codetypedesc=@codetypedesc, editime=@editime, ed_s_user_id=@ed_s_user_id where id=@id; select a.*,b.codename isenable_text,c.username ad_s_user_name from p_codetype a,p_code b,s_user c where a.isenable=b.code and b.tab_p_codetype_id='ISENABLE' and a.ad_s_user_id=c.id and a.id=@id;

data.name: DeleteCodeTypeCmd_Sql
data.value: delete from p_codetype where id=@id

data.name: DeleteCodeTypeCmd_Err
data.value: 代码类型删除失败，请重试！

data.name: AddCodeCmd_Err
data.value: 新代码添加失败，请重试！

data.name: AddCodeCmd_Sql
data.value: insert into p_code (code,tab_p_codetype_id,p_code,codename,codedesc,sort,addtime,ad_s_user_id,isenable,invalid) values (@code, @tab_p_codetype_id, @p_code,@codename, @codedesc, @sort, @addtime, @ad_s_user_id, @isenable, @invalid); select a.code+','+a.tab_p_codetype_id id,a.*,b.codename isenable_text,c.username ad_s_user_name from p_code a, p_code b,s_user c where a.isenable=b.code and b.tab_p_codetype_id='ISENABLE' and a.ad_s_user_id=c.id and a.tab_p_codetype_id=@tab_p_codetype_id and a.code=@code;

data.name: DeleteCodeCmd_Sql
data.value: delete from p_code where tab_p_codetype_id=@tab_p_codetype_id and code=@code;

data.name: UpdateCodeCmd_Err
data.value: 代码信息更新失败，请重试！

data.name: UpdateCodeCmd_Sql
data.value: update p_code set codename=@codename, codedesc=@codedesc, sort=@sort, editime=@editime, ed_s_user_id=@ed_s_user_id where tab_p_codetype_id=@tab_p_codetype_id and code=@code; select a.code+','+a.tab_p_codetype_id id,a.*,b.codename isenable_text,c.username ad_s_user_name from p_code a, p_code b,s_user c where a.isenable=b.code and b.tab_p_codetype_id='ISENABLE' and a.ad_s_user_id=c.id and a.tab_p_codetype_id=@tab_p_codetype_id and a.code=@code;

data.name: AddUserCmd_Err
data.value: 新用户添加失败，请重试！

data.name: AddUserCmd_Sql
data.value: insert into s_user (username,password,sex,alias,firstname,lastname,qq,email,idcard,mobile,fax,addtime,opt_s_user_id,isenable,invalid) values (@username,@password,@sex,@alias,@firstname,@lastname,@qq,@email,@idcard,@mobile,@fax,@addtime,@opt_s_user_id,@isenable,@invalid) select a.id,a.username,a.sex,a.alias,a.firstname,a.lastname, a.firstname+a.lastname as realname,a.qq,a.email,a.idcard,a.mobile,a.fax,a.last_logoutime, a.addtime,a.opt_s_user_id,a.isenable,a.invalid,b.codename isenable_text from s_user a, p_code b where a.isenable=b.code and b.tab_p_codetype_id='ISENABLE' and a.id=SCOPE_IDENTITY();

data.name: UpdateUserCmd_Err
data.value: 用户信息更新失败，请重试！

data.name: UpdateUserCmd_Sql
data.value: update s_user set sex=@sex,alias=@alias,firstname=@firstname,lastname=@lastname,qq=@qq,email=@email,idcard=@idcard,mobile=@mobile,fax=@fax where id=@id; select a.id,a.username,a.sex,a.alias,a.firstname,a.lastname, a.firstname+a.lastname as realname,a.qq,a.email,a.idcard,a.mobile,a.fax,a.last_logoutime, a.addtime,a.opt_s_user_id,a.isenable,a.invalid,b.codename isenable_text from s_user a, p_code b where a.isenable=b.code and b.tab_p_codetype_id='ISENABLE' and a.id=@id;

data.name: DeleteUserCmd_Sql
data.value: delete from s_user where id in (0@ids);

data.name: AddRoleCmd_Err
data.value: 新角色添加失败，请重试！

data.name: AddRoleCmd_Sql
data.value: insert into s_role (tab_s_rolegroup_id,rolename,roledesc,startime,endtime,addtime,ad_s_user_id,isenable,invalid) values (@tab_s_rolegroup_id,@rolename, @roledesc, DATEADD(s,@startime,'1970-01-01 00:00:00'), DATEADD(s,@endtime,'1970-01-01 00:00:00'), @addtime, @ad_s_user_id, @isenable, @invalid); select a.*,b.codename isenable_text,c.username ad_s_user_name from s_role a,p_code b,s_user c where a.isenable=b.code and b.tab_p_codetype_id='ISENABLE' and a.ad_s_user_id=c.id and a.id=SCOPE_IDENTITY();

data.name: DeleteRoleCmd_Err
data.value: 角色删除失败，请重试！

data.name: DeleteRoleCmd_Sql
data.value: delete from s_role where id in (0@ids);

data.name: ListRolesCmd_Err
data.value: 角色列表查询失败，请重试！

data.name: ListRolesCmd_Sql
data.value: select a.id,a.rolename,a.roledesc,a.startime,a.endtime,a.addtime ,c.username ad_s_user_name,b.codename isenable_text from s_role a, p_code b,s_user c where a.isenable=b.code and b.tab_p_codetype_id='ISENABLE' and a.ad_s_user_id=c.id order by a.id asc

data.name: UpdateRoleCmd_Err
data.value: 角色信息更新失败，请重试！

data.name: UpdateRoleCmd_Sql
data.value: update s_role set rolename=@rolename,roledesc=@roledesc,startime=DATEADD(s,@startime,'1970-01-01 00:00:00'),endtime=DATEADD(s,@endtime,'1970-01-01 00:00:00'), editime=@editime, ed_s_user_id=@ed_s_user_id where id=@id; select a.*,b.codename isenable_text,c.username ad_s_user_name from s_role a,p_code b,s_user c where a.isenable=b.code and b.tab_p_codetype_id='ISENABLE' and a.ad_s_user_id=c.id and a.id=@id;

data.name: LoginByIdCmd_Sql
data.value: select id, username, sex, firstname, lastname, firstname+lastname as realname, qq, email, idcard, mobile, fax, apikey, secretkey, addtime, opt_s_user_id, isenable, invalid from s_user where isenable=1 and id=@id and password=@password

data.name: ResetMyPasswordCmd_OldPassword_Err
data.value: 原始密码输入错误，请重试！

data.name: ResetMyPasswordCmd_NewPassword_Err
data.value: 很抱歉，新密码重置失败，请重试！

data.name: ResetMyPasswordCmd_Sql
data.value: update s_user set password=@password where id=@id

data.name: ResetMyPasswordCmd_Tip
data.value: 恭喜您，新密码重置成功！

data.name: ResetMyPasswordCmd_Err
data.value: 操作异常，请重试！

data.name: EmpowerRoleCmd_Err
data.value: 角色授权失败，请重试！

data.name: EmpowerRoleCmd_Sql
data.value: insert into s_role_modopt (tab_s_modopt_id,tab_s_role_id,addtime,ad_s_user_id,isenable,invalid) values (@tab_s_modopt_id, @tab_s_role_id, @addtime, @ad_s_user_id, @isenable, @invalid); select a.*,b.codename isenable_text,c.username opt_s_user_name from s_role_modopt a,p_code b,s_user c where a.isenable=b.code and b.tab_p_codetype_id='ISENABLE' and a.ad_s_user_id=c.id and a.tab_s_modopt_id=@tab_s_modopt_id and a.tab_s_role_id=@tab_s_role_id;

data.name: UnEmpowerRoleCmd_Sql
data.value: delete from s_role_modopt where tab_s_modopt_id=@tab_s_modopt_id and tab_s_role_id=@tab_s_role_id

data.name: ListModOptsCmd_Sql
data.value: select a.*,b.codename isenable_text,c.username opt_s_user_name from s_modopt a,p_code b,s_user c where a.isenable=b.code and b.tab_p_codetype_id='ISENABLE' and a.opt_s_user_id=c.id and a.tab_s_module_id=@tab_s_module_id order by a.tab_p_code_moptype_id asc

data.name: ListModOptsCmd_Err
data.value: 模块操作列表查询失败，请重试！

data.name: AddOrgCmd_Err
data.value: 新组织添加失败，请重试！

data.name: AddOrgCmd_Sql
data.value: insert into s_org (p_id,orgname,orgdesc,tab_s_orgtype_id,sort,addtime,opt_s_user_id,isenable,invalid) values (@p_id, @orgname, @orgdesc, @tab_s_orgtype_id, @sort, @addtime, @opt_s_user_id, @isenable, @invalid); select a.*,b.codename isenable_text,c.username opt_s_user_name from s_org a,p_code b,s_user c where a.isenable=b.code and b.tab_p_codetype_id='ISENABLE' and a.opt_s_user_id=c.id and a.id=SCOPE_IDENTITY();

data.name: DeleteOrgCmd_Sql
data.value: delete from s_org where id in (0@ids);

data.name: ListOrgsCmd_Err
data.value: 组织列表查询失败，请重试！

data.name: ListOrgsCmd_Sql
data.value: select a.*,b.codename isenable_text,c.username opt_s_user_name from s_org a,p_code b,s_user c where a.isenable=b.code and b.tab_p_codetype_id='ISENABLE' and a.opt_s_user_id=c.id @appendSQL order by a.p_id,a.sort,a.id asc

data.name: UpdateOrgCmd_Err
data.value: 组织信息更新失败，请重试！

data.name: UpdateOrgCmd_Sql
data.value: update s_org set orgname=@orgname, orgdesc=@orgdesc, tab_s_orgtype_id=@tab_s_orgtype_id, sort=@sort where id=@id; select a.*,b.codename isenable_text,c.username opt_s_user_name from s_org a,p_code b,s_user c where a.isenable=b.code and b.tab_p_codetype_id='ISENABLE' and a.opt_s_user_id=c.id and a.id=@id;

data.name: AddMyUrlCmd_Err
data.value: 新网址添加失败，请重试！

data.name: AddMyUrlCmd_Sql
data.value: insert into p_myurl (url,memo,tab_p_code_ispublic_id,addtime,opt_s_user_id,isenable,invalid) values (@url,@memo,@tab_p_code_ispublic_id, @addtime, @opt_s_user_id, @isenable, @invalid); select a.*,b.codename isenable_text,c.username opt_s_user_name,d.codename ispublic_text from p_myurl a,p_code b,s_user c,p_code d where a.isenable=b.code and b.tab_p_codetype_id='ISENABLE' and a.tab_p_code_ispublic_id=d.code and d.tab_p_codetype_id='ISPUBLIC' and a.opt_s_user_id=c.id and a.id=SCOPE_IDENTITY();

data.name: ListMyUrlsCmd_Err
data.value: 网址列表查询失败，请重试！

data.name: ListMyUrlsCmd_Sql
data.value: select a.*,b.codename isenable_text,c.username opt_s_user_name,d.codename ispublic_text from p_myurl a,p_code b,s_user c,p_code d where a.isenable=b.code and b.tab_p_codetype_id='ISENABLE' and a.tab_p_code_ispublic_id=d.code and d.tab_p_codetype_id='ISPUBLIC' and a.opt_s_user_id=c.id and (a.tab_p_code_ispublic_id=1 or a.opt_s_user_id=@opt_s_user_id) order by a.id desc

data.name: DeleteMyUrlCmd_Sql
data.value: delete from p_myurl where opt_s_user_id=@opt_s_user_id and id in (0@ids);

data.name: UpdateMyUrlCmd_Err
data.value: 网址信息更新失败，请重试！

data.name: UpdateMyUrlCmd_Sql
data.value: update p_myurl set url=@url, memo=@memo, tab_p_code_ispublic_id=@tab_p_code_ispublic_id where opt_s_user_id=@opt_s_user_id and id=@id; select a.*,b.codename isenable_text,c.username opt_s_user_name,d.codename ispublic_text from p_myurl a,p_code b,s_user c,p_code d where a.isenable=b.code and b.tab_p_codetype_id='ISENABLE' and a.tab_p_code_ispublic_id=d.code and d.tab_p_codetype_id='ISPUBLIC' and a.opt_s_user_id=c.id and a.opt_s_user_id=@opt_s_user_id and a.id=@id;

data.value: update s_rolegroup set rolegroupdesc=@rolegroupdesc, editime=@editime, ed_s_user_id=@ed_s_user_id where id=@id; select a.*,b.codename isenable_text,c.username ad_s_user_name from s_rolegroup a,p_code b,s_user c where a.isenable=b.code and b.tab_p_codetype_id='ISENABLE' and a.ad_s_user_id=c.id and a.id=@id;

data.name: ListDataSourcesCmd_Err
data.value: 数据源列表失败，请重试！

data.name: ListDataSourcesCmd_Sql
data.value: select a.id,a.dsname,d.codename dstype_text,a.dsdesc,a.sqls,a.addtime ,c.username ad_s_user_name,b.codename isenable_text from p_datasource a, p_code b,s_user c,p_code d where a.dstype=d.code and d.tab_p_codetype_id='DSTYPE' and a.isenable=b.code and b.tab_p_codetype_id='ISENABLE' and a.ad_s_user_id=c.id order by a.id asc
